what: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
text: goal package portawaterperu provide access data community portable water systems Peru. data collected SIASAR database consisted information surveys water catchments, storage system, treatment, distribution networks maintainance.

title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
text: can install development version portawaterperu GitHub : Alternatively, can download individual datasets CSV XLSX file table .
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("openwashdata/portawaterperu") ## Run the following code in console if you don't have the packages ## install.packages(c("dplyr", "knitr", "readr", "stringr", "gt", "kableExtra")) library(dplyr) library(knitr) library(readr) library(stringr) library(gt) library(kableExtra)

title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
text: package provides access one dataset portawaterperu.

title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
text: dataset portawaterperu contains data abour portable water system 32 communities Peru. 32 observations 51 variables overview variable names, see following table.

title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
code: library(portawaterperu) library(ggplot2) # Provide some example code here portawaterperu |>    #dplyr::filter(stringr::str_starts(divisiones, "AMAZONAS")) |>   #dplyr::group_by(divisiones) |>    #dplyr::summarise(mean = mean(pob_servida)) |>    ggplot(aes(y = pop_serviced, color = type_gravity))+   geom_boxplot(outliers = F)+   labs(title = "Population served given different gravity types",        y= "Population") +   theme_classic()

title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
text: dataset shared part capstone project Data Science openwashdata. information project explore insights, please visit project page https://ds4owd-001.github.io/project-laurenjudah/ (public available)

title: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data
text: data obtained @SIASAR, information system containing data rural water supply sanitation services. Using SIASAR’s “download data country” tool, available data Peru (10 excel files) downloaded. examining 10 excel files, 5 pertained potable water systems. 5 data sets imported R subsequently empty values unnecessary columns deleted . Finally, 5 data sets combined 1 data frame based community ID. combined, cleaned data set contains data 32 communities. SIASAR provide matching data dictionary. openwashdata developer went attachements original questionnaire: https://globalsiasar.org/es/content/documentacion-tecnica https://globalsiasar.org/en/content/technical-documentation variable description written best guess information attachements.

what: portawaterperu: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data — portawaterperu
title: portawaterperu: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data — portawaterperu
text: Data project obtained @SIASAR, information system containing data rural water supply sanitation services. Using SIASAR's "download data country" tool, available data Peru (10 excel files) downloaded. examining 10 excel files, 5 pertained potable water systems. 5 data sets imported R subsequently empty values unnecessary columns deleted . Finally, 5 data sets combined 1 data frame based community ID. combined, cleaned data set contains data 32 communities.

title: portawaterperu: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data — portawaterperu
portawaterperu: A Preliminary Review of Peruvian Potable Water System Data — portawaterperu
text: tibble 32 rows 51 variables name Name community water system ID ID water system div Geographical division community lat Latitude community long Longitude community alt Altitude community year Year data collection communities. (Use caution) community Community name service_provider Service provider (PSE stands Prestador de servicio) pop_serviced Population served hh_serviced Household served type_gravity community served gravity water supply system? type_pump community served pumped water supply system? type_well community served well/hand pump water supply system? type_rain community served rainwater harvesting water supply system? water_dry_season adequate water resources (source) meet demand dry season? water_rain_season adequate water resources (source) meet demand rainy season? source_id ID water source source_type Type water source, options including (1) lake, (2) river, (3) dug well, (4) drilled well. source_lat Latitude water source source_long Longitude water source source_alt Altitude water source catch_macromeasure Macro measurement catchment catch_status Status catchment, options including (1) : good, (2) B: fair, (3) C: poor, (4) D: Inoperable. maintenance_date Date maintainance data collection catch_abcd Status catchment maintainance, options including (1) : good, (2) B: fair, (3) C: poor, (4) D: Inoperable. cond_abcd Status condition maintainance, options including (1) : good, (2) B: fair, (3) C: poor, (4) D: Inoperable. treat_type Type treatment, options including (1) desinfection chlorine (2) slow filtration. treat_abcd Status treatment maintainance, options including (1) : good, (2) B: fair, (3) C: poor, (4) D: Inoperable. storage_abcd Status storage system maintainance, options including (1) : good, (2) B: fair, (3) C: poor, (4) D: Inoperable. dist_abcd Status distribution network maintainance, options including (1) : good, (2) B: fair, (3) C: poor, (4) D: Inoperable. flow Flow rate, check unit column flow_unit Unit flow rate chlorine_res Chlorine residual chlorine_res_unit Unit chlorine residual treatment_ID ID treatment treatment_type Type treatment treatment_function treatment functional? treatment_lat Latitude water treatment treatment_long Longitude water treatment treatment_alt Altitude water treatment storage_ID ID water storage infrastructure. storage_clean_unit Unit cleaning frequency storage system storage_lat Latitude water storage infrastructure. storage_long Longitude water storage infrastructure. storage_alt Altitude water storage infrastructure. storage_status Status water storage infrastructure, options including (1) : good, (2) B: fair, (3) C: poor, (4) D: Inoperable. dist_ID ID distribution system dist_hour Hours service per day dist_connection Number distribution network connections dist_status Status distribution system, options including (1) : good, (2) B: fair, (3) C: poor, (4) D: Inoperable.
